# Government Tender Announcement

## Services for the Re-certification of DEIMS Applications

The Department of National Defence (DND) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Professional Services for the Re-certification of DEIMS Applications.

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** CB-8240-17014970
* **Publication Date:** August 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 6, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** October 2, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** October 1, 2026

### Tender Specifications

The selected contractor will provide information technology security threat and risk assessment (TRA) and certification and accreditation (C&A) services to support activities related to the re-certification of DEIMS applications.

Specifically, the contract will require the provision of:

* Four (4) IT Security TRA and C&A Analysts to provide expert services related to the re-certification of DEIMS applications

### Tendering Process

This tender is scheduled as a competitive request for proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement (SA). The selection criteria will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to qualified bidders under the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of National Defence (DND), located at:

60 Moode Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K2H 8G1, Canada

For more information, please contact:
